text: 13.4 Lom 6.4, Plp 2.7-8, 1 Pi 3.18 Nɨŋɨd apun, ne ned bɨ kɨles ma mɨdeb tek yek, nop mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumak. God pen kɨles ne ak dɨl Klays nop gek, mɨñɨl koŋɨm mɨdeb. Chɨn anɨb ak nep. Klays nop chɨg tep gɨl, bɨ kɨles ma mɨdeb tek mɨdobun. God pen kɨles ne ak dɨl chɨnop gek, Klays ayɨp koŋɨm mɨdɨl, nɨbop nen agɨl wog gɨpun ak nɨgɨnɨgabɨm.
